Jet Set Radio After OST - Teknopathetic (e-Pop 'n' Disco 80's mix)YouTube · 5:46 · 322K · 99%This is a reallly old idea that actually came up when the third game in the Jet Set Radio series was proposed as an idea back in 2006. The soundtracks for both the original game and Future were somethings I had always admired, and thankfully for me their genres they were put more in my familiar realm if I ever wanted to replicate them. So over the past few *years* or so I've been searching for the samples used in songs from both the original Jet Set Radio and Jet Set Radio Future soundtracks, and I'm going to be using them to flesh out my music composition and audio production skills / give the Jet Set Radio Wii pitch something beyond a few pieces of concept art. This is going to include remixes of most of the songs from the first 2 soundtracks (like how Future remixed the first game's songs) and hopefully some original tracks (which will be MUCH harder). As for this song, I only came across it recently which kind of reinspired me to work on this project. It's from the game Ollie King, and was a pretty wicked remix if I could say so myself. The Ollie King OST also had a remix of The Concept of Love, which takes care of another track for what I'm working on (since these 2 remixes are so bomb already). But yea, this is just a very long WIP. I'm closest to actually putting together the remix for the song "Let Mom Sleep", but I wouldn't expect anything for awhile since finals are around the corner and summer seems like it will just be work and school -_-. As for the name "Jet Set Radio After", that's just what I've called it for the longest time since it would be....After....JSRFuture o.o. But I've grown to think of that name as official xD. So all I can say is enjoy this track and expect something hopefully similar (and original) from my own hands...and hopefully soon $_$ Concept art by Corey Lewis
